problem: 已知:如图,点C是线段AB的中点,点D是线段BC的中点,AB=20cm,那么线段AD等于()
answer: 【解答】解:∵点C是线段AB的中点,AB=20cm,∴BC=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×20cm=10cm,∵点D是线段BC的中点,∴BD=\frac{1}{2}BC=\frac{1}{2}×10cm=5cm,∴AD=AB-BD=20cm-5cm=15cm．
comment: 本题主要考查了两点间的距离、线段中点的定义等知识；熟练掌握线段中点的定义是解决问题的关键．
problem_en: It is known that: as shown in the figure, point C is the midpoint of line segment AB, point D is the midpoint of line segment BC, AB = N_0, then the length of line segment AD is equal to ()
